General.Name: Petpal Pet Nutrition Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Petpal Pet Nutrition Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sales of pet food related products in China. It offers animal skin and plant chew products; dry and wet pet foods; nutritious meat snacks; and bird food, edible small animal toys, baked biscuits, and other products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Wenzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhao Bo  Tang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non Independent Director
